sourcesContent:
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Select, Text, Input, TableContainer, Table, Thead, Tr, Th, Tbody, Td, Button, useDisclosure, Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalCloseButton, ModalBody, FormControl, FormLabel, ModalFooter, Avatar} from "@chakra-ui/react"; import SidebarSuperAdmin from "../../components/SidebarSuperAdmin"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import api from "../../services/api" const AdminManajemen = () => { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); // Second Modal Delete Data const [secondModal, setSecondModal] = useState(false); const closeSecondModal = () => setSecondModal(false); const openSecondModal = () => setSecondModal(true); // Third Modal Add Data Admin const [thirdModal, setThirdModal] = useState(false); const closeThirdModal = () => setThirdModal(false); const openThirdModal = () => setThirdModal(true); // state management untuk menyimpan selected name const [selectedUser, setSelectedUser] = useState(""); // function handle select change by name const handleSelectChange = (event) => { setSelectedUser(event.target.value); getUser(); }; // Get Fetch data users from BE const [dataUsers, setDataUsers] = useState(); const getUser = async () => { try { const response = await api.get(`/api/v1/users`,{ params: { name: selectedUser, }, }); setDataUsers(response.data.payload) } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching data:', error); } }; console.log(dataUsers) // Component did mount start method useEffect(() => { getUser(); }, []); return( <> Users Manajemen Admin {dataUsers && dataUsers.map(user => ( ))}
Id Profile Name Username Password Role Action
{user.id} {user.profile ? ( ): ( )} {user.name} {user.username} {user.password} {user.role}
{/* Modal Edit */} Edit Data Admin Id Username Password Role Gender {/* Second modal Delete */} Are you sure ? Are you sure to delete this admin ? {/* Modal Add Data Admin */} Add Data Admin Name Username Password Role Gender Profile Picture ) }; export default AdminManajemen;
